articles.content: NEW YORK (Reuters) - The euro was boosted on Monday as risk sentiment improved in the wake of Britains trade deal with the European Union and U.S. President Donald Trumps decision to approve a new fi… [+3829 chars]

articles.author: Peter Aitken
articles.title: British government plans to approve Oxford vaccine, distribute starting Jan. 4 - Fox News
articles.description: The plan to distribute the vaccine includes both the Pfizer and Oxford vaccines.
articles.content:
The Oxford COVID-19vaccine will be distributed across the U.K. starting January 4 if it is approved, according to a report by the Sunday Telegraph.
